changes.description: Added aria-label attribute to IconButton component
changes.new_value: <IconButton onClick={onClose} size="small" sx={{ ml: 2 }} aria-label="Close dialog">

patterns_discovered.description: Adding ARIA labels to interactive elements for screen reader support
Adding semantic attributes to Material-UI components without modifying styling

gotchas_discovered.description: Used 'Close dialog' instead of just 'Close' to be more descriptive for screen reader users and match the semantic context of the component
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Choose descriptive ARIA labels that provide context about the action being performed

approach_outcome.execution_summary: Added aria-label attribute to the Modal's close button IconButton component in a single, targeted change. The modification improves accessibility by providing screen reader users with a clear label for the close button action.

recommendations.suggestion: Consider auditing other interactive elements in the Modal component for missing ARIA labels (confirm button, cancel button, etc.)
recommendations.rationale: Consistent accessibility improvements across all interactive elements enhance user experience for screen reader users

recommendations.suggestion: Document ARIA labeling conventions used in the project for consistency across components
recommendations.rationale: Ensures consistent accessibility patterns and helps future developers implement ARIA attributes correctly

recommendations.suggestion: Add automated accessibility testing to verify ARIA labels are present and meaningful on interactive elements
recommendations.rationale: Prevents regression of accessibility improvements in future changes
